import React from "react"; class ShoppingCart extends React.Component{ constructor(props) { super(props); this.state = { basketball:'', futsal:'', volleyball:'', soccer:'', footy:'' } } getShoppingCart = () => { fetch('http://localhost:3000/shoppingcart', { method: 'post', headers: {'Content-Type': 'application/json'}, body: JSON.stringify({ id: this.props.id }) }) .then(response => response.json()) .then(user => { console.log(user); this.setState({ basketball:user.basketball, footy:user.footy, volleyball:user.volleyball, soccer:user.soccer, futsal:user.futsal }) }) } render() { return(
